task.title: Change the Garbage Collection constant
task.shortdesc: After you create a cluster, you should change the Garbage Collection (GC) constant to false. This applies only to NetApp Element software 12.2.

context.p: For more information, see NetApp Support Bulletin SU437.

step.cmd: Gather the MVIP for your SolidFire cluster.

info.p: This is the IP address you use to connect to the cluster UI web page.

After the prompt, enter your cluster admin username and password.
